title.rendered: CrowdSwap partners with OmniaVerse to take metaverse gaming to the next level

content.rendered:
CrowdSwap partners with OmniaVerse to take metaverse gaming to the next level

CrowdSwap is proud to announce its partnership with OmniaVerse, a multi-chain platform that allows its users to monetize their artwork using metaverse-supported gaming platforms. Through the support of CrowdSwap, OmniaVerse will be able to add best-price routing and swaps seamlessly to their platform.

Status quo

After the rise in popularity of cryptocurrencies, play-to-earn (P2E) games have become commonplace among gamers. Even non-gamers have shown interest in blockchain-based games because of their unique P2E experience. Besides the concentration on NFTs, OmniaVerse wants to integrate a swap functionality for cryptocurrency swaps into their project tokens and future tokens that will launch on the platform. 

The solution and partnership

CrowdSwap’s best-price routing and swap feature is one of the most popular features used and appreciated by our community daily. We are excited that Omniaverse will be the first project to natively incorporate this function into their platform via the CrowdSwap API. The API will give Omniaverse’s community direct access to the supported blockchains Ethereum, BSC, Polygon, and Avalanche. As part of the collaboration, we will continuously expand the functionality of the API. The need for atomic cross-chain swaps already exists and will be essential in a proper multi-chain environment. Cross-chain swaps will be integrated into the API next, allowing Omniaverse to add a seamless multi-chain feeling to its offering automatically.

Best-price routing is based on a meshed graph over the liquidity pools of the respective blockchains. These graphs determine the best routes to the requested coins and tokens. The various prices of the DEXes are then further matched with the swap ancillary costs before a processed ranking is returned to the callers. Price and cost are based on on-chain data that is constantly updated to achieve the best possible result.

Through the CrowdSwap API, projects can natively and easily integrate the benefits of a best-price swap solution into their application, delivering a one-stop user experience to their community. 

OmniaVerse and CrowdSwap agreed to start a strategic collaboration bringing synergies from different areas of our businesses together for our communities. We are thrilled to explore the opportunities.

About OmniaVerse 

OmniaVerse is a multi-chain platform that allows its users to monetize their artwork using metaverse-supported gaming platforms that support GLB models (Meta, Minecraft etc.).

About CrowdSwap

CrowdSwap is a cross-chain automation and optimization platform for the DeFi opportunity space. With best-price-routing and cross-chain solutions, CrowdSwap provides safe passage to take the best opportunities fast and from anywhere. The on-Chain analysis will constantly monitor the market and provide you with the best options for your assets. Find out how easy DeFi can be at CrowdSwap.
